title: Interpreting Entries
text: Entry a31 is the number at row $$3$$, column $$1$$, which is $$3$$. The entry a22 is the number at row $$2$$, column $$2$$, which is $$4$$. Remember, the row comes first, then the column.
speech: Entry a31 is the number at row  3 , column  1 , which is  3 . The entry a22 is the number at row  2 , column  2 , which is  4 . Remember, the row comes first, then the column.
pacedSpeech: Entry a31 is the number at row   3
. The entry a22 is the number at row   2
. Remember, the row comes first, then the column.
